description:
SDR⭐

Digital Bank Scale Up

Base salary: $85,000-$100,000

Hybrid / Remote - LA area strongly preferred


Our client is a leading financial technology company that empowers banks and fintechs with state-of-the-art embedded finance solutions. Their platform enables seamless integration of financial products, allowing clients to manage liquidity and access banking services without the need for extensive infrastructure. This innovative approach simplifies complex financial processes, driving the growth and success of modern financial products in the marketplace. By partnering with our client, companies can enhance their offerings and deliver exceptional value to their customers.


Responsibilities:

  • Lead Generation: Identify and qualify leads through outbound channels and referral partners.
  • Sales Representation: Use deep product knowledge to meet customer needs.
  • Sales Process: Refine and improve sales processes.
  • Relationship Building: Cultivate relationships with prospective clients and share best practices.
  • Team Collaboration: Work cross-functionally to execute go-to-market strategies.
  • Industry Awareness: Stay updated on fintech and banking trends.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s Degree.
  • 2+ years in sales with a proven record of exceeding lead targets.
  • 1+ years in financial services, fintech, or high-growth technology.
  • Strong independent lead sourcing and qualification abilities.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for influencing stakeholders.
  • Perseverance in outreach and direct sales activities.
  • Understanding of fintech-partner banking and relevant regulations.
  • Proficiency with CRM tools (Salesforce, HubSpot) and MS Suite.


Bonus Points:

  • Experience at a Digital Banking


Benefits:

  • Competitive pay, insurance, 401k, stock purchase program.
  • Paid time off, flexible scheduling, remote work options.
  • Associate banking perks.
  • Professional growth in a meritocratic environment.
  • Minimal overtime (up to 5%) and limited travel (0-10%).


Please apply above or email me at katherine.farquharson@storm2.com
